mapper.update: update release_user set rel_number = #{relNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rel_password = #{relPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rel_photo = #{relPhoto,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rel_name = #{relName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rel_sex = #{relSex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rel_birthday = #{relBirthday,jdbcType=DATE}, rel_palce = #{relPalce,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rel_id_number = #{relIdNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rel_order_completion_number = #{relOrderCompletionNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, rel_order_cancel_number = #{relOrderCancelNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER} where rel_id = #{relId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select rel_id, rel_number, rel_password, rel_photo, rel_name, rel_sex, rel_birthday, rel_palce, rel_id_number, rel_order_completion_number, rel_order_cancel_number from release_user where rel_id = #{relId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select rel_id, rel_number, rel_password, rel_photo, rel_name, rel_sex, rel_birthday, rel_palce, rel_id_number, rel_order_completion_number, rel_order_cancel_number from release_user
